text:
Šaban Šaulić (; 6 September 1951 – 17 February 2019) was a Serbian folk singer. His debut EP 'Dajte mi utjehu' was released in 1969 when he was eighteen. He was known as 'The King of Folk'. He was also a judge on the televised singing competition "Zvezde Granda" between 2013 and 2016.
Šaulić was killed in a car crash on 17 February 2019, at Bielefeld, aged 67.
